thread.title: Crystal Palace Officially Complete Signing of Olympiacos Midfielder Luka Milivojevic
thread.title_full: Crystal Palace Officially Complete Signing of Olympiacos Midfielder Luka Milivojevic | 90min

author: Crystal Palace
title: Crystal Palace Officially Complete Signing of Olympiacos Midfielder Luka Milivojevic

organizations.name: olympiacos midfielder luka milivojevic ​ crystal palace

text:
​ Crystal Palace have completed the signing of Serbian international midfielder Luka Milivojevic from reigning Greek champions Olympiacos in a deal believed to be worth £13m. The Eagles have already spent significant fees on Jeffrey Schlupp and Patrick van Aanholt this month. 


Having previously also won a league title in Belgium with Anderlecht, Milivojevic has signed a three-and-a-half year deal that will keep him at Selhurst Park until June 2020.
BREAKING: #CPFC are delighted to announce the signing of Luka Milivojevic on a three-and-a-half year deal! #WelcomeLuka  pic.twitter.com/WiV1voaVgi 
— Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) January 31, 2017 
The 25-year-old has played in both the Champions League and the Europa League this season and promises to add much needed depth to Palace's midfield in a deep lying role.

He also played against Arsenal in the Champions League last season and was formerly managed by current Hull boss Marco Silva at Olympiacos.

"I am delighted to bring Luka to the club. He has experience in UEFA Champions League and International football and will add a new dimension to our midfield," manager Sam Allardyce told  ​CPFC.co.uk .
"He is a talented two footed player with intelligent passing ability as well as being very strong defensively, in and out of possession."
